snippet.title: Silent Ops - iPhone, iPad & Android
snippet.description:
Available soon on iPhone, iPad & Android

Two clandestine organizations. Three secret agents. A myriad of mysteries. Join the mission to uncover a plot that could change the very fate of humanity in this stealth action game coming soon to iPhone and iPad.

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/GameloftAndroid 
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
